formulas.name: Bodyofemail
formulas.expression: 'Hi ' &{!First_Name} &BR()&BR()& 'Welcome to Red Mountain Weight Loss Portal. To get started, go to https://demosbox-healthcloudtrialmaster-15a4d-17ca4c6c8ca.cs68.force.com/patients/s/' &BR()& 'Please use your registered email, which is '& {!Emailfrominitialform.value} &', to login and use the password generated recently.' &BR()&BR()& 'Thanks,' &BR()& 'Red Mountain Weight Loss'

formulas.name: Subject
formulas.expression: "Your new Patient portal with RM is ready!!!"

Flow.label: New Patient Appointment Booking Flow v1

recordUpdates.name: update_lead_status_to_time_slot_selected
recordUpdates.label: update lead status to time slot selected

fields.name: display3
fields.fieldText: ~2 mins left

fields.name: Confirmationmessage
fields.fieldText:
Confirmation Message:


Your appointment has been confirmed, please login in the patient portal to complete your medical documentations before your upcoming appointment. Please click on next to be redirected to that page.

fields.name: Display
fields.fieldText:
Your Appointment has been reserved but not booked. Please complete setting up your account in portal to successfully book the appointment.


Please note that you have 15 minutes from now to complete your booking or else you will loose the spot.

fields.name: errorMsg
fields.fieldText: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: errorMsg_0
fields.fieldText: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: errorMsg_0_0
fields.fieldText: Please contact Red Mountain Weight Loss helpline for more information.

fields.name: errorMsg_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: Please contact Red Mountain Weight Loss helpline for more information.

fields.name: fault
fields.fieldText: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: RedirectMessage
fields.fieldText: Redirecting to Home Page!

fields.name: display2
fields.fieldText: ~3 mins left

fields.name: redirectToPage
fields.fieldText:
Existing patients need to enter their details in the other form. Please click the link below!


Goto Page!

fields.name: Displayquestions
fields.fieldText: Please enter your demographic details for appointment booking.

fields.name: First_Name
fields.fieldText: First Name

fields.name: Last_Name
fields.fieldText: Last Name

fields.name: Zipcode
fields.fieldText: Zipcode

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a five digit zip code

fields.name: Marketing_Opt_In
fields.fieldText: Marketing Opt In
fields.helpText: Yes! Email me helpful tips & promotions for my journey to a healthy life!

fields.name: HowDidYouHearAboutUsNew
fields.fieldText: How did you hear about us ?

fields.name: display5
fields.fieldText: ~1 mins left

fields.name: Confirmationinfo
fields.fieldText:
Appointment Details Review



{!First_Name}, please take a moment to review the appointment details below for accuracy and schedule your service by clicking the BOOK IT button.


Your {!getrecordofworktypegroup.Name} has been booked from {!ServiceAppointment.SchedStartTime} to {!ServiceAppointment.SchedEndTime}.


﻿{!ServiceAppointment.Street}{!ServiceAppointment.City}

{!ServiceAppointment.State}

{!ServiceAppointment.Country}

{!ServiceAppointment.PostalCode}




﻿

fields.name: Selectmarkettype
fields.fieldText: Select the type of service that is required.

fields.name: screenCantServiceZip
fields.fieldText: Based on your submission we do not currently service your area. If you have any further questions you can call our service center at (800) 239-7830

variables.description: Specify a default time zone for Lightning Scheduler appointments.
variables.name: DefaultTimeZone

variables.description: variable to hold values of distance units.
variables.name: distanceUnit

variables.description: Specify a comma-separated list of service resource IDs. Depending on the page, these IDs are used to filter work type groups, service territories, or service resources.
variables.name: FilterByResourceIds

variables.description: Stores the API name of the scheduling policy you want to associate with the flow.
variables.name: SchedulingPolicyName
